name: Project Legacy
description:
Link to reddit post.

[Controls]

Press these buttons hard enough, and something might happen!

  • Classics Scheme
    • Left/Right/Up/Down Arrow
    • Z/X/C
    • Space
    • Alpha1/2/3/4
  • Recommended Scheme
    • W/A/S/D
    • J/K/L/U
    • O
    • Escape
    • R
[Find a Bug?]

Too bad!

Don't bother telling us either, because of course, what are you expecting from such an unfinished game? bwahaha

... darn it, I forgot to update the game's icon. It should be from the image in the loading screen, by the way.
